mapper.select: SELECT kp.id AS pageId, kp.TITLE AS title, kpc.CONTENT AS souceContent, kpc.DRAW_CONTENT AS content, kpv.ID AS versionId, kw.ID AS workSpaceId, kw.PARENT_ID AS workSpaceParentId, kw.ROUTE AS route, kwp.REFERENCE_TYPE AS referenceType, kp.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER AS objectVersionNumber, kp.CREATED_BY AS createdBy, kp.CREATION_DATE AS creationDate, kp.LAST_UPDATED_BY AS lastUpdatedBy, kp.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS lastUpdateDate FROM kb_workspace kw INNER JOIN kb_workspace_page kwp ON kw.ID = kwp.WORKSPACE_ID INNER JOIN kb_page kp ON kp.ID = kwp.PAGE_ID INNER JOIN kb_page_version kpv ON kpv.ID = kp.LATEST_VERSION_ID INNER JOIN kb_page_content kpc ON kpc.VERSION_ID = kpv.ID AND kw.ID = #{id}

SELECT kw.ID AS workSpaceId, kw.PARENT_ID AS workSpaceParentId, kw.ROUTE AS route, kwp.REFERENCE_TYPE AS referenceType, kwp.REFERENCE_URL AS referenceUrl, kwp.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER AS objectVersionNumber, kwp.CREATED_BY AS createdBy, kwp.CREATION_DATE AS creationDate, kwp.LAST_UPDATED_BY AS lastUpdatedBy, kwp.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS lastUpdateDate FROM kb_workspace kw INNER JOIN kb_workspace_page kwp ON kw.ID = kwp.WORKSPACE_ID AND kw.ID = #{id}
